title: Getting started
text: World Health Organization maintained International Classification Diseases (ICD) recording cause death since 1893. updated ICD periodically reflect new discoveries epidemiology changes medical understanding disease. Centers Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS), agency responsible maintaining inpatient procedure code set U.S., contracted 3M Health Information Systems 1993 design develop procedural classification system replace Volume 3 ICD-9-CM. ICD-10-PCS initially released 1998. updated annually since time although use entire time. ICD-10-PCS code set logical, consistent structure follows logical, consistent process individual character level. means process constructing codes ICD-10-PCS also logical consistent. Individual letters numbers, called “values,” selected sequence occupy seven spaces code, called “characters.” coding system learned, process simplified.

Based details procedure performed, values character specifying section, body system, root operation, body part, approach, device, qualifier assigned. definition character function actual physical position code, value placed different position code means something totally different. value 0 1st character means something different 0 2nd character, 0 3rd character, .

title: Getting started
text: ICD-10-PCS composed 17 sections, represented numbers 0-9 letters B-D, F-H X. broad procedure categories contained sections range surgical procedures substance abuse treatment new technology. complete ICD-10-PCS presented three parts: Index, Tables, List Codes. also list guidelines ICD-10-PCS code book instruct use PCS code set.

title: Getting started
text: first section, Medical Surgical, contains great majority procedures typically reported inpatient setting. shown previous section discussing ICD-10-PCS code structure, procedure codes Medical Surgical section begin section value 0. Coding Example Let’s take look example. operative report describe excision dorsal ganglion located wrist level. coding ICD-10-PCS, code built selecting appropriate characters describe intent, approach, qualifying information procedure performed. Operative Report: Excision dorsal ganglion, right wrist patient adequate anesthesia, right upper extremity prepped draped sterile manner. arm exsanguinated tourniquet elevated 290 mm/Hg. transverse incision made dorsal ganglion. Using blunt dissection dorsal ulnar sensory nerve branches radial sensory nerve branches dissected retracted operative field. extensor tendon incised, dissected, retracted operative field. ganglion dissected origin dorsal distal scapholunate interosseus ligament excised. Care taken protect ligament integrity wound infiltrated 0.25% Marcaine. tendons allowed resume normal anatomical position. skin closed 3-0 Prolene subcuticular stitch. Sterile dressings applied. tourniquet deflated. Section 0 – Medical Surgical Body System L – Tendons (Extensor tendon) Root Operation B – Excision (tendon excised removed) Body Part 5 – Lower Arm, Wrist, Right (extensor tendon located wrist level) Approach 0 – Open (incision performed blunt dissection carried layers tissue expose site) Device Z – Device Qualifier Z – Device Coding Note: purpose ICD-10-PCS code explain purpose procedure using every character describe way procedure performed.

title: Getting started
text: Sections 0-9 ICD-10-PCS comprise Medical Surgical Related sections. sections include obstetrical procedures, administration substances, measurement monitoring body functions, extracorporeal therapies, listed table . sections 1 2, seven characters define aspects procedure Medical Surgical section. Codes sections 3-9 structured part like counterparts Medical Surgical section, exceptions. example, sections 5 6, 5th character defined duration instead approach, code intra-aortic balloon pump (IABP): Additional differences include uses 6th character: Section 3 defines 6th character substance. Sections 4 5 define 6th character function. Sections 7 9 define 6th character method.
code: sections() |>    select(value = code, description = label) |>   filter(value %in% as.character(c(0:9))) #> # A tibble: 10 × 2 #>    value description                                           #>    <chr> <chr>                                                 #>  1 0     Medical and Surgical                                  #>  2 1     Obstetrics                                            #>  3 2     Placement                                             #>  4 3     Administration                                        #>  5 4     Measurement and Monitoring                            #>  6 5     Extracorporeal or Systemic Assistance and Performance #>  7 6     Extracorporeal or Systemic Therapies                  #>  8 7     Osteopathic                                           #>  9 8     Other Procedures                                      #> 10 9     Chiropractic pcs("5A02210") #> # A tibble: 7 × 5 #>   axis  name        value label                                            table #>   <chr> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                                            <chr> #> 1 1     Section     5     Extracorporeal or Systemic Assistance and Perfo… 5     #> 2 2     Body System A     Physiological Systems                            5A    #> 3 3     Operation   0     Assistance                                       5A0   #> 4 4     Body System 2     Cardiac                                          5A02  #> 5 5     Duration    2     Continuous                                       5A022 #> 6 6     Function    1     Output                                           5A02… #> 7 7     Qualifier   0     Balloon Pump                                     5A02…

title: Getting started
text: Sections B-D F-H comprise ancillary sections ICD-10-PCS. six sections include imaging procedures, nuclear medicine, substance abuse treatment, listed table 2. definitions characters ancillary sections differ seen previous sections. Imaging section, 3rd character defined root type, 5th 6th characters define contrast contrast/qualifier respectively, CT scan example . coding CT scans, documentation must support components proper selection ICD-10-PCS code. section first character come Imaging section. body system based area examined. root type determined type imaging (CT, MRI, X-ray). body part selected determining specific body area analyzed procedure. contrast character used determine high osmolar, low osmolar, type contrast used, applicable. qualifier character used specify enhanced unenhanced images taken. Example: CT scan brain Technique: 2.5 mm thick axial images obtained head diatrizoate (high osmolar contrast). 0.625 mm thick axial images well coronal sagittal enhanced images also submitted interpretation. Findings: intra- extra-axial blood fluid collection present. mass shift midline. Brain densities normal. ventricles sulci normal size configuration. Vascular structures normal appearance. pituitary, orbits, paranasal sinuses unremarkable. calvarium intact. Additional differences include: Section C defines 5th character radionuclide. Section D defines 5th character modality qualifier 6th character isotope. Section F defines 5th character type qualifier 6th character equipment. Sections G H define 3rd character root type qualifier. Section X defines 7th character new technology group. letter changes year new technology codes added system. example, Section X codes added first year 7th character value 1, New Technology Group 1. next year contains new Section X codes 7th character value 2, New Technology Group 2, etc.
code: sections() |>    select(value = code, description = label) |>   filter(value %in% c("B", "C", "D", "F", "G", "H", "X")) #> # A tibble: 7 × 2 #>   value description                                      #>   <chr> <chr>                                            #> 1 B     Imaging                                          #> 2 C     Nuclear Medicine                                 #> 3 D     Radiation Therapy                                #> 4 F     Physical Rehabilitation and Diagnostic Audiology #> 5 G     Mental Health                                    #> 6 H     Substance Abuse Treatment                        #> 7 X     New Technology pcs("B02000Z") #> # A tibble: 7 × 5 #>   axis  name        value label                             table   #>   <chr> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                             <chr>   #> 1 1     Section     B     Imaging                           B       #> 2 2     Body System 0     Central Nervous System            B0      #> 3 3     Type        2     Computerized Tomography (CT Scan) B02     #> 4 4     Body Part   0     Brain                             B020    #> 5 5     Contrast    0     High Osmolar                      B0200   #> 6 6     Qualifier   0     Unenhanced and Enhanced           B02000  #> 7 7     Qualifier   Z     None                              B02000Z

Code many additional codes documented operative report. 02H40JZ Insertion pacemaker lead coronary vein, open approach 02H60JZ Insertion pacemaker lead right atrium, open approach 02HK0JZ Insertion pacemaker lead right ventricle, open approach 0JH607Z Insertion cardiac resynchronization pacemaker pulse generator chest subcutaneous tissue fascia, open approach Appendix H contains Non-Affecting MS-DRG Assignment codes. ICD-10-PCS Fundamentals ICD-10-PCS designed developed adhere recommendations made National Committee Vital Health Statistics (NCVHS). also incorporates input wide range organizations, individual physicians, healthcare professionals, researchers. Several structural attributes recommended new procedure coding system. attributes include following: Multiaxial structure Completeness Expandability Multiaxial structure key attribute provides framework structural attributes multiaxial code structure. Multiaxial code structure makes possible ICD-10-PCS complete, expandable, provide high degree flexibility functionality. CODING TIP Multiaxial refers “one axis” developing single line. ICD-10-PCS codes composed seven characters. character can considered axis. Thus, structure code “multiaxial.” character represents category information can specified procedure performed. character defines category information physical position code. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Section Body System Root Operation Body Part Approach Device Qualifier character’s position can understood semi-independent axis classification allows different specific values inserted space, whose physical position remains stable. Within defined code range, character retains general meaning confers value position. example, 5th character retains general meaning “approach” sections 0-4 7-9 system. specific value 5th character define specific approach, Open. group values character contains valid choices relation characters code, giving system completeness. 5th character, example, significantly distinct approach assigned approach value applicable approach values included represent possible versions procedure. group values character can added needed, giving system expandability. significantly new distinct approach used perform procedures, new approach value can added system upcoming years. group values confined character, giving ICD-10-PCS stable, predictable readability across wide range codes. sections 0-4 7-9 system, example, 5th character always represents approach. ICD-10-PCS’ multiaxial structure houses capacity completeness, expandability, flexibility, giving high degree functionality multiple uses. Completeness Completeness considered key structural attribute new procedure coding system. specific recommendation completeness includes characteristics: unique code available significantly different procedure. code retains unique definition. Codes reused. unique code can constructed every significantly different procedure. vastly enhances data capturing process. title: Getting started
text: PCS codes composed seven alphanumeric characters. character contains 34 possible values. seven characters make complete code specific meanings vary 17 sections manual. value represents specific option general character definition. 10 digits (0-9) 24 letters (-H, J-N, P-Z) may used character. letters O used avoid confusion digits 0 1.

title: Getting started
text: character axis classification specifies information procedure performed. Within defined code range, character specifies type information axis classification. example, fifth axis classification specifies Approach sections 0 4 7 9 system.
code: tibble(   Position = c("Label", "Code", "Meaning"),   `1` = c("Section", "0", "Medical and Surgical"),   `2` = c("Body System", "0", "Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves"),   `3` = c("Operation", "1", "Bypass"),   `4` = c("Body Part", "6", "Cerebral Ventricle"),   `5` = c("Approach", "0", "Open"),   `6` = c("Device", "7", "Autologous Tissue Substitute"),   `7` = c("Qualifier", "0", "Nasopharynx")) |>    gt() |>    tab_spanner(label = "Table", columns = c(`1`, `2`, `3`)) |>   tab_spanner(label = "Row", columns = c(`1`, `2`, `3`, `4`)) |>   tab_spanner(label = "Code", columns = c(`1`, `2`, `3`, `4`, `5`, `6`, `7`)) |>   cols_align(align = 'center') |>    opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |>    #opt_table_outline() |>    opt_table_lines(extent = "all") |>    tab_options(     column_labels.vlines.style = "solid",     column_labels.vlines.width = px(3),     #column_labels.font.weight = "bold",     heading.align = "left"   ) |>    tab_header(title = md("**ICD-10-PCS** Code Structure"))

title: Getting started
code: tables() |> summarise(codes = sum(n_codes), prop = codes / 78220, .by = c(section, system)) |> left_join(sections()[c('code', 'label')], by = join_by(section == code)) |> left_join(systems()[c('code', 'label')], by = join_by(system == code)) |> select(section = label.x, code = system, system = label.y, codes, prop) |> gt(groupname_col = "section", rowname_col = "system") |> fmt_percent(columns = prop, decimals = 2) |> fmt_number(columns = codes, decimals = 0) |> opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> cols_align(align = "center", columns = code) |> cols_label(code = "") |> tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", alpha = 0.5), cell_text(weight = "bold")), locations = cells_body(columns = code)) |> opt_all_caps(locations = c("row_group")) |> opt_align_table_header(align = "left") |> tab_header(title = html("ICD-10-PCS 2024")) |> tab_options( column_labels.hidden = TRUE, heading.title.font.size = px(22), table.font.size = px(14), column_labels.border.bottom.width = px(0), column_labels.border.top.width = px(0), row_group.font.size = px(16))

ℹ 885 more rows rows("041L")$axes #> $row_203.041L #> # A tibble: 16 × 4 #>    axis  title     code  label                           #>    <chr> <chr>     <chr> <chr>                           #>  1 5     Approach  0     Open                            #>  2 5     Approach  4     Percutaneous Endoscopic         #>  3 6     Device    9     Autologous Venous Tissue        #>  4 6     Device    A     Autologous Arterial Tissue      #>  5 6     Device    J     Synthetic Substitute            #>  6 6     Device    K     Nonautologous Tissue Substitute #>  7 6     Device    Z     No Device                       #>  8 7     Qualifier H     Femoral Artery, Right           #>  9 7     Qualifier J     Femoral Artery, Left            #> 10 7     Qualifier K     Femoral Arteries, Bilateral     #> 11 7     Qualifier L     Popliteal Artery                #> 12 7     Qualifier M     Peroneal Artery                 #> 13 7     Qualifier N     Posterior Tibial Artery         #> 14 7     Qualifier P     Foot Artery                     #> 15 7     Qualifier Q     Lower Extremity Artery          #> 16 7     Qualifier S     Lower Extremity Vein            #>  #> $row_204.041L #> # A tibble: 4 × 4 #>   axis  title     code  label                  #>   <chr> <chr>     <chr> <chr>                  #> 1 5     Approach  3     Percutaneous           #> 2 6     Device    J     Synthetic Substitute   #> 3 7     Qualifier Q     Lower Extremity Artery #> 4 7     Qualifier S     Lower Extremity Vein

title: Getting started
code: definitions() |>    summarise(n = n(),              .by = c(code, section, axis, axis_name)) |>    arrange(axis) #> # A tibble: 29 × 5 #>    code  section                                           axis  axis_name     n #>    <chr> <chr>                                             <chr> <chr>     <int> #>  1 0     Medical and Surgical                              3     Operation    31 #>  2 1     Obstetrics                                        3     Operation    12 #>  3 2     Placement                                         3     Operation     7 #>  4 3     Administration                                    3     Operation     3 #>  5 4     Measurement and Monitoring                        3     Operation     2 #>  6 5     Extracorporeal or Systemic Assistance and Perfor… 3     Operation     3 #>  7 6     Extracorporeal or Systemic Therapies              3     Operation    11 #>  8 7     Osteopathic                                       3     Operation     1 #>  9 8     Other Procedures                                  3     Operation     1 #> 10 9     Chiropractic                                      3     Operation     1 #> # ℹ 19 more rows definitions(section = "F") |>    filter(axis == "5") |>    select(label) |>    mutate(axis_code = row_number(), .before = 1) #> # A tibble: 132 × 2 #>    axis_code label                                           #>        <int> <chr>                                           #>  1         1 Acoustic Reflex Decay                           #>  2         2 Acoustic Reflex Patterns                        #>  3         3 Acoustic Reflex Threshold                       #>  4         4 Aerobic Capacity and Endurance                  #>  5         5 Alternate Binaural or Monaural Loudness Balance #>  6         6 Anthropometric Characteristics                  #>  7         7 Aphasia (Assessment)                            #>  8         8 Aphasia (Treatment)                             #>  9         9 Articulation/Phonology (Assessment)             #> 10        10 Articulation/Phonology (Treatment)              #> # ℹ 122 more rows

title: Getting started
code:
pcs("0016070") |> gt(rowname_col = "axis") |> opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> cols_align(align = "center", columns = c(axis, code)) |> tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", alpha = 0.5), cell_text(weight = "bold")), locations = cells_body(columns = code)) |> opt_all_caps() |> tab_header(title = html("ICD-10-PCS 2024
"), subtitle = html("SECTION: 0 Medical and Surgical
SYSTEM: 0 Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves
OPERATION: 1 Bypass

")) |> tab_options( heading.title.font.size = px(24), heading.subtitle.font.size = px(18), heading.align = "left", table.font.color = "#0B0B45" ) #> Error in `resolve_cols_i()`: #> ! Can't subset columns that don't exist. #> ✖ Column `code` doesn't exist. definitions() |> dplyr::filter(code == '0', axis == '3', axis_code == '1') |> dplyr::select(definition, explanation, includes) |> unlist() #> definition #> "Altering the route of passage of the contents of a tubular body part" #> explanation #> "Rerouting contents of a body part to a downstream area of the normal route, to a similar route and body part, or to an abnormal route and dissimilar body part. Includes one or more anastomoses, with or without the use of a device" #> includes #> "Coronary artery bypass, colostomy formation" definitions() |> dplyr::filter(code == '0', axis == '5', label == 'Open') |> dplyr::pull(definition) #> [1] "Cutting through the skin or mucous membrane and any other body layers necessary to expose the site of the procedure" definitions() |> dplyr::filter(code == '0', axis == '6', label == 'Autologous Tissue Substitute') |> dplyr::pull(includes) #> [1] "Autograft" #> [2] "Cultured epidermal cell autograft" #> [3] "Epicel(R) cultured epidermal autograft" index(search = "Excision, Skin and Breast") |> dplyr::filter(code == "^0HB") #> # A tibble: 0 × 6 #> # ℹ 6 variables: id , index , term , type , value , #> # code pcs("0HB2XZZ") #> # A tibble: 7 × 5 #> axis name value label table #> #> 1 1 Section 0 Medical and Surgical 0 #> 2 2 Body System H Skin and Breast 0H #> 3 3 Operation B Excision 0HB #> 4 4 Body Part 2 Skin, Right Ear 0HB2 #> 5 5 Approach X External 0HB2X #> 6 6 Device Z No Device 0HB2XZ #> 7 7 Qualifier Z No Qualifier 0HB2XZZ # Axis 1 |-- Section: 0 Medical and Surgical 2 |-- Body System: H Skin and Breast 3 |-- Root Operation: B Excision 4 |-- Body Part: 2 Skin, Right Ear 5 |-- Approach: X External 6 |-- Device: Z No Device 7 |-- Qualifier: Z No Qualifier 1 |-0: Medical and Surgical 2 |-H: Skin and Breast 3 |-B: Excision 4 |-2: Skin, Right Ear 5 |-X: External 6 |-Z: No Device 7 |-Z: No Qualifier

title: Tidy ICD-10-PCS interface
